Package com.PDLB.PPE.API.repository

Interface CustomerRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Customer,String>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Customer,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Customer,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Customer,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Customer,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Customer>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Customer,String>
@Repository public interface CustomerRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Customer,String>
This interface represents the customer repository, which allows us to perform CRUD operations on customer entities in the database.

  • Method Details

    • createCustomer

      @Transactional @Query(value="CALL sp_createCustomer(?1, ?2, ?3, ?4, ?5, ?6)", nativeQuery=true) String createCustomer(String name, String surname, String phoneNumber, String email, int language, String password)
      Creates a customer in the database.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the customer.
      surname - The surname of the customer.
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the customer.
      email - The email of the customer.
      language - The language preference of the customer.
      password - The password of the customer.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly created customer.

    • getAllCustomers

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getAllCustomers", nativeQuery=true) ArrayList<Customer> getAllCustomers()
      Retrieves all customers from the database.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Customer objects representing all customers.

    • getCustomerByNameAndSurname

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getCustomerByNameAndSurname(?1, ?2)", nativeQuery=true) ArrayList<Customer> getCustomerByNameAndSurname(String name, String surname)
      Retrieves customers from the database by their name and surname.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the customer.
      surname - The surname of the customer.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Customer objects with the specified name and surname.

    • getCustomerByEmail

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getCustomerByEmail(?1)", nativeQuery=true) Customer getCustomerByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves a customer from the database by their email.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the customer.
      Returns:
      The Customer object with the specified email, or null if not found.

    • getCustomerByPhoneNumber

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getCustomerByPhoneNumber(?1)", nativeQuery=true) Customer getCustomerByPhoneNumber(String phoneNumber)
      Retrieves a customer from the database by their phone number.
      Parameters:
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the customer.
      Returns:
      The Customer object with the specified phone number, or null if not found.

    • getCustomerById

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getCustomerById(?1)", nativeQuery=true) Customer getCustomerById(String id)
      Retrieves a customer from the database by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the customer.
      Returns:
      The Customer object with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • getCustomerByProviderId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getCustomersByProviderId(?1, ?2, ?3)", nativeQuery=true) ArrayList<Customer> getCustomerByProviderId(String providerId, int offset, int limit)
      Retrieves customers from the database by the provider ID.
      Parameters:
      providerId - The ID of the provider.
      offset - The offset for pagination.
      limit - The maximum number of customers to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Customer objects associated with the specified provider.

    • countCustomerByProviderId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_countCustomersByProviderId(?1)", nativeQuery=true) int countCustomerByProviderId(String providerId)
      Counts the customers associated with a specific provider.
      Parameters:
      providerId - The ID of the provider.
      Returns:
      The total number of customers associated with the specified provider.

    • getCustomerByBuildingId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getCustomerByBuildingId(?1)", nativeQuery=true) Customer getCustomerByBuildingId(String buildingId)
      Retrieves a customer from the database by the building ID.
      Parameters:
      buildingId - The ID of the building.
      Returns:
      The Customer object associated with the specified building, or null if not found.

    • updateCustomer

      @Modifying @Transactional @Query(value="CALL sp_updateCustomer(?1, ?2, ?3, ?4, ?5, ?6)", nativeQuery=true) void updateCustomer(String id, String name, String surname, String phoneNumber, String email, int language)
      Updates the details of a customer in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the customer to update.
      name - The updated name of the customer.
      surname - The updated surname of the customer.
      phoneNumber - The updated phone number of the customer.
      email - The updated email of the customer.
      language - The updated language preference of the customer.

    • resetCustomerPassword

      @Modifying @Transactional @Query(value="CALL sp_resetCustomerPassword(?1, ?2)", nativeQuery=true) void resetCustomerPassword(String email, String password)
      Resets the password of a customer in the database.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the customer whose password is to be reset.
      password - The new password for the customer.

    • deleteCustomerById

      @Modifying @Transactional @Query(value="CALL sp_deleteCustomerById(?1)", nativeQuery=true) void deleteCustomerById(String id)
      Deletes a customer from the database by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the customer to delete.
